structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Registry may institute action to declare vacancy upon determination violation occurred.
law.text: The office or candidacy of any person required by KRS 61.710 to 61.780 to file a report who fails to file the report required by KRS 61.710 to 61.780 within thirty (30) days after receipt of the registry's notice of noncompliance provided in KRS 61.750 or willfully files fraudulent information shall be void, and the office or candidacy shall be filled as provided by law for the filling of the vacancy. An action to declare a vacancy under KRS 61.710 to 61.780 may be brought by the registry upon its determination, after investigation and hearing, that a violation of KRS 61.710 to 61.780 has occurred.
